alert.note: Alert for Banks; Dawson; Hall; Lumpkin; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:49AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Forsyth, southeastern Lumpkin, northern Banks, White, southeastern Dawson and Hall Counties through 815 AM EDT... At 749 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Robertstown to near Murrayville to Drew, and moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Cumming, Cleveland, Homer, Buford, Braselton, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Lula, Clermont, Helen, Gillsville, Unicoi State Park, Candler, Drew, Robertstown, Coal Mountain, Mossy Creek, Murrayville and Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
